description: Ralph Lauren is proud to partner with Morehouse, a prestigious historically Black college, to introduce a first-of-its-kind collection. Inspired by the rich heritage and esteemed traditions of Morehouse College, this suit jacket is tailored in Italy from chalk-stripe flannel and finished with genuine horn buttons.
fitting_details: Polo Soft: trim fit, with a natural shoulder, a high armhole, 3.25" lapels, and a shorter length.
Size 40R has a 30" front body length, a 29.5" back body length, an 18.5" shoulder, and a 17.5" sleeve inseam.
Notch lapels. Buttonhole at the left lapel. Three-button silhouette. Genuine horn buttons. Cuffs with four decorative buttons.
Left chest patch pocket. Two front waist flapped pockets. Two interior chest pockets.
Single vent. Half-canvassed. Lined at the back yoke and the sleeves.
Alterations available in Ralph Lauren retail stores.
Shell: wool. Body lining: cotton, viscose. Sleeve lining: viscose, acetate. Dry clean. Made in Italy.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size 40R.
Please note that due to high demand, each Morehouse Collection style is limited to two per person.
